description: Turkey's leader needs Russia to help reach a Syrian ceasefire, but Moscow poses a bigger challenge to the West.
title: How Russia's Putin became the go-to man on Syria
title_page: How Russia's Putin became the go-to man on Syria - BBC News
maintext: But barring any fundamental shift on the part of Mr Putin - and many analysts see his antipathy towards the West as part of his broader effort to mobilise support and to retain power - there is unlikely to be any broader rapprochement between Russia and the West, at least for now.
